Yes, it's a code word

We want you to tell us about your experience with broccoli. By signing up, you can get cash rewards for answering surveys about broccoli, and sharing your experiences, ideas and suggestions.

Get the app

About the app

Try Broccoli, Get Paid

That’s right, broccoli is green, and so is cash. You fill out surveys, get cash rewards. No tricks, no gimmicks. Your experience has value; we recognize and reward that.

Get the app

How it works

The Science of Broccoli

Our studies consist of your experiences. From surveys to virtual clinical trials, we compensate you for your time and experience. Whether you’re a weekend enthusiast, a lifestyle connoisseur, or just a casual user, we have surveys and trials available for you. You can participate in as many, or as few, as you wish and get paid for any participation.

Our mission

Steamed? No
Baked? Yes

There is a vast cultural history that has flourished underground. The more knowledge we collect, the better we can educate others. Our goal is to use the research gathered from our studies to better inform the healthcare community, and to give a voice to consumers.
